snippet.title: ABSOLUTE MATTER // Reveal Trailer // 1st Person PvX MMO
snippet.description:
In ABSOLUTE MATTER (formerly THE INVITATION) the players and the environment dynamically create quests.

This new approach creates a base for you to not just play a game, but truly experience adventures that matter to you.

The game offers three kinds of invitations to you: PvX-Events, Player Generated Quests and Environment Invitations. All of these share one single most important goal: 
Maximize Player Interaction.

Join the development on our discord:
https://discord.gg/9DCEAfz

Find more information on our website and social media:
https://absolute-matter.com
https://twitter.com/TheInvitation5
https://www.instagram.com/the_invitation_game/

Special thanks go to Max from Lost Ember for the great soundtrack! Listen to his music here:
https://soundcloud.com/maxrude/the-invitation-reveal-trailer-music
